show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: The Economic Nuts And Bolts Are Falling Apart

title: The Economic Nuts And Bolts Are Falling Apart
content:
Plenty of evidence that we are going down exactly the same path as in the late 1920s (wild speculation, huge income… disparities, bubbles, etc.
) and the final denouement cannot be any different.
It is all ignored by the media and the public.
The present high level of unemployment simply does not allow for economic growth.
The case of the automotive industry and the dark shadows of subprime debt underlying the glowing reports of brisk car sales.
The grim slowdown in China and the US municipalities being dragged underwater.
The story of the too-big-to-fail banks, much bigger now than they were in 2008 at the time of the melt-down.
Spain’s authorities also lie about their economic situation.
Target hiring 18,000 fewer temporary holiday season workers this year.
Highly qualified ladies (MBAs, law degrees, other Masters degrees, etc.
) looking for work as career nannies because they cannot find work elsewhere.
More evidence that computers are taking jobs away.
The desperate case of Japan.
The BIS, the only global financial body to warn of the 2007/8 crisis is warning about the upcoming one which promises to be even worse.
